title: Premium for granting such additional BUA beyond permissible FSI as per Table No 12 shall be charged at the rate of 50% of ASR for open developed land of FSI 1 and shall be equally shared between the GoM
clause_text: Premium for granting such additional BUA beyond permissible FSI as per Table No 12 shall be charged at the rate of 50% of ASR for open developed land of FSI 1 and shall be equally shared between the GoM. and MCGM. Provision of IH shall not be applicable for development in CBD.
